title: Can we talk about Flex Que?

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
So this is a typical game in Flex Que.

Enemy team had an average of +400 MMR.

Why is Flex Que so bad and what is Riot going to do about it?

From what I've read I'm the only person who is actually trying to take this Que seriously but I've reached a point where I don't think I'll play it again.

Seems pointless having a Que that has worse matchmaking then Normals and that people take less seriously.

replies.body:
I tried to take it seriously, but gave up and no longer play Flex after constantly being matched with and against Platinum players (I'm Bronze 5, so I always ended up feeding my face off).

Then again... If I constantly play with Platinum players, wouldn't that mean I'll quickly improve? Or isn't that how it works?
